Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.

    DOP Adult Supervision Passthrough by Fiscal Year

    The sum of: the number of cases on the first day of the reporting period, plus all cases added during the reporting period.

    DOP Adult Supervision Passthrough by Calendar Year

    The sum of: the number of cases on the first day of the reporting period, plus all cases added during the reporting period.

    DOP Adult Supervision Passthrough by Fiscal Year

    The sum of: the number of cases on the first day of the reporting period, plus all cases added during the reporting period.

    DOP Adult Supervision Intakes by Fiscal Year

    The number of adults sentenced to probation supervision during the reporting period.

    DOP Adult Supervision Intakes by Calendar Year

    The number of adults sentenced to probation supervision during the reporting period.

    DOP Adult Supervision Intakes by Fiscal Year

    The number of adults sentenced to probation supervision during the reporting period.

    DOP Adult Rearrest Rate (Monthly Average)

    The number of adult probationers rearrested divided by the number supervised during the reporting period.

    DOP Adult Rearrest Rate (Monthly Average)

    The number of adult probationers rearrested divided by the number supervised during the reporting period.

    DOP Adult Probationers Rearrested As A Percentage Of NYPD Arrest Report (Monthly Average)

    The percentage of adult probationer arrests relative to all arrests recorded by the Police Department during the reporting period.

    DOP Adult Probationers Rearrested As A Percentage Of NYPD Arrest Report (Monthly Average)

    The percentage of adult probationer arrests relative to all arrests recorded by the Police Department during the reporting period.

    DOP Adult Investigations Ordered

    The number of pre-sentence investigation reports ordered for adults during the reporting period.

    DOP Adult Investigations Ordered

    The number of pre-sentence investigation reports ordered for adults during the reporting period.

    DOP Adult Investigations by Fiscal Year

    The number of presentence investigation reports ordered for adults during the reporting period, categorized by conviction type: felony and misdemeanor.

    The number of presentence investigation reports ordered for adults during the reporting period, categorized by conviction type: felony and misdemeanor.
